duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team in developing and architecting large-scale applications using the Microsoft Power Platform.
Implement business process workflows and logic using Microsoft Power Automate.
Design and build data integration using various Power Platform connectors and custom APIs.
Create large-scale database designs using Common Data Services and PowerApps Data Flows.
Develop enterprise-wide applications using Power Platform technologies that are responsive to various devices.
Define architecture and design patterns for integrating technical and data services using Power Platform.
Partner with Architects to create high-level designs for technical and information services.
Drive compliance with established software development lifecycle and release process.
Understand business requirements to design business and technical services.
Communicate technical strategy and roadmap to execute target state.
Collaborate with stakeholders across the IT organization and business as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science (Master's preferred)
